title: The Final Plague Foretold
summary: Exodus 11 announces the final and most severe plague: the death of all Egypt’s firstborn. God tells Moses that Pharaoh will finally let Israel go. Moses warns Pharaoh, but Pharaoh remains unyielding.

faq.question: What was the final plague announced by God?
faq.answer: The death of every firstborn in Egypt, from Pharaoh’s son to the lowest servant’s child.

faq.question: How did Pharaoh respond to Moses’ warning?
faq.answer: His heart was hardened, and he did not let the Israelites go.
